entry.title: Trick or Treat Bags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oilcloth by the Yard
Type: Bags
Price: 18.00

Perfect, especially since you know, you'll be schlepping the treats! These upscale bags make it fun to use on Halloween and throughout fall when you are shopping at the farmers market or grocery store.

These adorable trick or treat bags are sized to hold all of your treats! 16" Tall by 12.5" Wide x 7" deep.

Get these embroidered with your initials or name!
